scripts.install: npm i -g tailwindcss gulp gulp-concat gulp-csso gulp-uglify
scripts.link: npm link gulp gulp-concat gulp-csso gulp-uglify
scripts.generate: picogen clean && npm run tailwindcss && gulp buildcss buildjs && picogen generate -s -f -p
scripts.push: node -e "const mssg = 'BUILD - ' + process.argv[1]; require('child_process').execSync('git add . && git commit -m \"' + mssg + '\" && git push', { stdio:[0, 1, 2] })"
scripts.update: npm run generate && npm run push
